Dataframe objects of class tt_*.

Source: R/as_df.R
as_df_tt.Rd

Dataframe objects of class tt_*.

# S3 method for tt
as_df(.x, ...)

# S3 method for tt_lst
as_df(.x, ...)

Arguments

.x

An object of class tt_*.
...

Other arguments passed to as_df().

Value

A dataframe.

Examples

# Class tt_lst
cns <- fgeo.habitat::luquillo_top3_sp
spp <- unique(cns$sp)
hab <- luquillo_habitat

tt_lst <- tt_test_lst(spp, cns, hab)
tt_df <- as_df(tt_lst)
head(tt_df)
#>           metric     sp    value
#> 1        N.Hab.1 CASARB   25.000
#> 2       Gr.Hab.1 CASARB 1489.000
#> 3       Ls.Hab.1 CASARB  109.000
#> 4       Eq.Hab.1 CASARB    2.000
#> 5 Rep.Agg.Neut.1 CASARB    0.000
#> 6 Obs.Quantile.1 CASARB    0.931

tail(tt_df)
#>            metric     sp    value
#> 67        N.Hab.4 SLOBER   17.000
#> 68       Gr.Hab.4 SLOBER 1151.000
#> 69       Ls.Hab.4 SLOBER  440.000
#> 70       Eq.Hab.4 SLOBER    9.000
#> 71 Rep.Agg.Neut.4 SLOBER    0.000
#> 72 Obs.Quantile.4 SLOBER    0.719

# Class tt

pdim <- c(320, 500)
gsz <- 20
abnd <- abund_index(cns, pdim, gsz)

tt <- tt_test(
  species = spp1,
  hab.index20 = hab_luq,
  allabund20 = abnd,
  plotdim = pdim,
  gridsize = gsz
)
#> Error in unique(hab.index20$habitats): object 'hab_luq' not found

tt_df <- as_df(tt)
#> Error in as_df(tt): object 'tt' not found
head(tt_df)
#>           metric     sp    value
#> 1        N.Hab.1 CASARB   25.000
#> 2       Gr.Hab.1 CASARB 1489.000
#> 3       Ls.Hab.1 CASARB  109.000
#> 4       Eq.Hab.1 CASARB    2.000
#> 5 Rep.Agg.Neut.1 CASARB    0.000
#> 6 Obs.Quantile.1 CASARB    0.931
tail(tt_df)
#>            metric     sp    value
#> 67        N.Hab.4 SLOBER   17.000
#> 68       Gr.Hab.4 SLOBER 1151.000
#> 69       Ls.Hab.4 SLOBER  440.000
#> 70       Eq.Hab.4 SLOBER    9.000
#> 71 Rep.Agg.Neut.4 SLOBER    0.000
#> 72 Obs.Quantile.4 SLOBER    0.719
